conclusion: The displacements of cars A and B are not the same.
The displacement of each car is represented by the area under the velocity-time graph.
For Car A, the area under the curve from t=0 to t=t1 is a trapezoid.
For Car B, the area under the curve from t=0 to t=t1 is a rectangle.
Since the areas are different, the displacements of the two cars are not the same.
